Blog.post: I have achieved our next target! Woot. Where to strike? An old munitions dump in Southeastern Tokyo! (aside) Muahahaha, my "comrades" do not realize it is a trap! I am evil! It is sounding fun! But I hope this is not a trap! Worry not, Leader Black Ninja would never deceive us! (aside) But I would! Muahahaha! ...Evil! Red Ninja, have you something to contributing to the group? (coughs) No, eh, just talking to myself.

"Sensei! Do you bring missions? More assassination!?" "No, eager green ninja! I find a colleague!" "I exist to serve Leader Black Ninja!" "How noble he is appearing!" "He copied my stance..." "Shush, jealous gray ninja! It is a noble stance for you as well!" -dances- "Yay!" "We never will be caught with noble red ninja in our forces!"

Using sophistocated COMPUTER TECHNOLOGY! Police forces have been able to produce this picture: It depicts the LOCATIONS of the three MINI-NINJAS as they attacked the helpless COMPUTER! Circles represent NINJA-LOCATION and are COLOR-CODED to NINJA-OUTFITS. Two other ninjas were off-screen observing the slaughter, the GREEN NINJA and LEADER BLACK NINJA.
THIS JUST IN: Computers are no defense against MINI-NINJA attacks! (photographic evidence below) (screenshot of graphic computer death below)
urlLink More ninja attacks! (it's funny, but I found this site after the ninjas attacked my computer) (...I'm not browsing the internet for little rubber ninja toy webrings...)

ATTENTION! $42,000,000 REWARD FOR CAPTURE -- DEAD OR ALIVE A band of FIVE brightly-colored NINJAS has been spotted in YOUR local area! They are ARMED, ORGANIZED, and highly DANGEROUS! Several people have already been KILLED! Many lives were LOST to bring you the photograph BELOW!
Armstrong won the Tour de France. That's awesome.
I'm feeling much better today! Kitties:
Sick today: At least I feel better than I did this morning.
Max lifting 75 pounds because I "dissed" him in previous photographs: (He may have been showing off for the ladies .) Hey, I'm in an appeasing mood.
My brother browsing the internet (my blog, of course) and talking on the phone: My brother posing to prove to a girl that he has a big nail:
New plant outside window: It rained: Cat wants to play: Cat stalking prey: (mouse or me?) F*#!ing internet is flickering:

Due to complaints from about 30% of our readers (one person) I now sport a fancy title! (pouts) I get none. But it is for the sake of distinguishability! The moral is: BAD THINGS CAN HAPPEN!

Apparently, there is confusing between Black Ninja and I, the Leader Black Ninja! This is clearly not neccessary! It is so easy to remember. (wide-eyed) Leader Black Ninja has two swords! Danger! I, mere Black Ninja, carry a knife, my favored weapon! Less danger! So to remember! I am many less dangerous than Leader Black Ninja! Clearly! THERE IS A DIFFERENCE (but similarities aid in NINJA CONFUSING POWER)
